channel.title: Daily News
channel.description: 毎日更新のニュースサマリー

item.description: Pinterest’s revenue grew 17% and Gen-Z usage hit over half of MAUs, helped by its AI ad suite Performance+. Still, a profit miss and slower user additions weighed on sentiment, highlighting the tensio...
ElevenLabs, best-known for text-to-speech and voice-translation tools, unveiled a generative-music model it says can be used commercially.

Menlo Ventures’ survey shows Anthropic’s Claude family now holds 32 % enterprise share vs. OpenAI’s 25 %. In coding tasks Claude has 42 % share. Enterprises cite safety, reliability and compliance as ...

OpenAI has doubled its revenue in the first seven months of 2025, hitting a $12 billion run-rate. Weekly active users of ChatGPT products stand near 700 million. Cash burn is projected to rise to $8 b...
Google は Android 向け学習支援「AI Mode」に **Canvas** を導入した。PDF をアップロードすると重要ポイントを抜き出し、図表へ注釈しながら質問応答できる学習プランを作成する。Google Lens と Project Astra を連携させ、リアルタイムに視覚情報を解析する仕組み。
